name: BreakingtheBarrier
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Join me, Andrew Lorenzo, as I push my body and mind to their limits in attempt to run a 2:40 Marathon by 2020. Along the way, I will talk about my journey and how it translates into daily life. I will talk to experts and members of the community in an effort to learn how to break out of comfort zones and bust through limits. Whether your journey is fitness, career, personal, or otherwise... You can find what you need to go further than you ever thought possible in hopes of breaking the barrier.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
